description: PortGenie is the Schema for the portgenies API

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: PortGenieSpec defines the desired state of PortGenie
spec.title: Specification

loginBanner.description: This is the login banner displayed before a user has logged into the Node.
loginBanner.title: Login Banner

nodes.description: List of nodes on which to configure the banners.
nodes.title: Nodes

portselector.description: Idetify which ports to create ie, 1 - 3, 5 - 10
portselector.title: Ports

ui-conditions.errorMsg: Either nodes or nodeSelector must have at least one value set

status.description: PortGenieStatus defines the observed state of PortGenie
status.title: Status

nodes.description: List of nodes this banner has been applied to
nodes.title: Nodes
